thread.title: 3 students at school for deaf sickened by pot brownies
thread.title_full: 3 students at school for deaf sickened by pot brownies - The Denver Post

author: The Associated Press
title: 3 students at school for deaf sickened by pot brownies
text:
RIVERSIDE, Calif. (AP) â€” Three girls at a Southern California school for the deaf have been hospitalized after eating marijuana brownies.
The Riverside Press-Enterprise (http://bit.ly/1kxFjtO ) says the girls, who attend California School for the Deaf, Riverside, became sick on Wednesday after eating the brownies.
They were treated at a hospital.
The school is for hard-of-hearing students in grades from kindergarten through 12th grade.
School officials say they're investigating the incident.
